issue.title: [C++] On Windows statically built lib file overwrites lib file of shared build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-882](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-882). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Statically built arrow.lib file overwrites previously built arrow.lib file of shared build. This possible should be resolved by renaming of statically built library, for instance, to arrow_static.lib

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-882?focusedCommentId=15980628) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 590
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/590>
